refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Plot3-ps converts an extended UnixPlot file to a PostScript file suitable for embedding in a larger PostScript document. This is especially useful for creating figures for inclusion in TeX documents. The -e option will produce and encapsulated PostScript file. The -s , -w , and -n options specify the size of the output image in inches (ignored when used with the -e option).
All UnixPlot line types are supported.
If no UnixPlot space directive is seen, the default space ranges from (0, 0, 0) to (4096, 4096, 4096).
